```{r setup}
library(dda)
library(fda.usc)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r preprocessing}
data(aemet)
temps <- aemet$temp
str(temps)

smooth <- function(...) {
  density(
    nbasis = 11,
    rangeval = c(10, 28),
    lambda = 1e-1,
    ...
  )
}

temps <- dda:::merge.dd(as.list(apply(temps$data, 1, smooth)))
plot(temps)
```

```{r ics}
temps_ics <- ICS(temps)
plot(temps_ics)
plot(temps_ics$W[1:3])
```

```{r ics_outlier}
temps_out <- ICS_outlier(temps)
plot(temps_out)
plot(temps) + scale_color_manual(values = temps_out$outliers + 1)
plot.fd(temps[temps_out$outliers == 1], col = "black")
fda:::lines.fd(mean(temps), col = "green")
plot.fd(temps, col = temps_out$outliers + 1)
```

```{r zbsplines_checks}
bfd <- fd(basisobj = temps$basis)
bfd$coefs <- to_zbsplines(basis = bfd$basis, inv = TRUE)
inprod(bfd)
plot(bfd)

a <- to_zbsplines(basis = bfd$basis, inv = TRUE)
a_inv <- to_zbsplines(basis = bfd$basis)
all(round(a %*% a_inv %*% temps$coefs - temps$coefs, 3) == 0)
all(round(a_inv %*% a, 14) == diag(bfd$basis$nbasis - 1))
```
